reviewText: My grandpa fought in wwii, received many medals including the purple heart. This series had me in tears over and over. Amazing!!!!!

This history preserved. Not many of these men are alive today. My father and all his buddies fought in WW2. They are all gone now. This was the most important event of the 20th century and we must not forget their sacrifice.
A must watch for World War 2 devotes.
doesn't let up. you will cry.
I'm a big WW2 history nut. This is another great addition to my DVD library. Thanks

I checked this out from my local library and was MORE than pleasantly surprised. I highly recommend it to anyone interested in WWII. There are many fantastic and very poignant interviews with veterans. There are some pretty amazing modern day explosions as well to give a feel for what it might have been like, if only in a small way. I honestly didn't expect this to be so well done. Very much worth adding to your collection. There are soldiers from different countries which is also a nice touch. Americans are well represented, but you also hear from Brits and Canadians. Give this one a try and you won't be disappointed.
